Product Features

Black, cotton T-shirt, classic design, with logo for 100 years of AGH UST. Details such as satin label with jubilee logo, sweatband ribbon in university colours, and printed design on the back make it unique. Made of high quality fabric. Made in Poland. Available in men’s and women’s styles.  

Product description  
size: women’s, fitted waist (from S to XL), men’s (from S to XXL)   
type: T-shirt  
colour: black   
type of print: silk-screen printing   
colour of print: white   
fabric: 92% cotton, 8% elastane  
basic weight of fabric: 160 gsm
